content: this is a loose-fit oversized balaclava worked in a unicolor 1x1 rib it has a fitting cord added to the brim so that it can be adjusted the gauge is referred to as worked in ribbing not in stockinette 1 5 skeins of 6mm acrylic yarn were used it calls for a crochet hook for the cord but it is optional so other cords can be used such as a braid follow me on instagram @knit bea knot
